description:
## Practice on SHACL part I ### Given the [lcc dataset](https://github.com/helio-ecosystem/helio-ecosystem/blob/main/resources/siotrx/actions/shacl/lcc-dataset.ttl) define a SHACL shape that contains a `sh:NodeShape` for the classes in the dataset `schema:CivicStructure`, `schema:Museum`, and `schema:CollegeOrUniversity`. Remember to specify the class from the dataset to which the node shape applies using the property `sh:targetClass`. Then, print the shape and check it with the **expected results**.

Note that the first thing to look up are the classes that the dataset has. To this end, the [SPARQL engine action can be used](https://github.com/helio-ecosystem/helio-action-sparql-engine). Once the shape is ready you can move to [Practice on SHACL part II](https://helio-playground.linkeddata.es/tour/SIoTRx%20practice%20on%20actions/Practice%20on%20SHACL%20part%20II) and validate some data.

@prefix ex: <http://shacl-practice.helio/resource/>.

ex:SampleShape a sh:NodeShape .
<#-- TODO: add the target class to which the shape applies -->
<#-- TODO: create a sh:NodeShape for each class in the lcc dataset -->

</#assign>

solution_template:
<#-- RDF data --> 
<#assign shape>
@prefix schema: <http://schema.org/> .
@prefix sh: <http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#> .
@prefix ex: <http://shacl-practice.helio/resource/>.

ex:CivicStructureShape 
  a sh:NodeShape ; 
  sh:targetClass schema:CivicStructure .

ex:MuseumShape 
  a sh:NodeShape ; 
  sh:targetClass schema:Museum .

ex:UniversityShape 
  a sh:NodeShape ; 
  sh:targetClass schema:CollegeOrUniversity .
</#assign>
[=shape]
